synopsis.text:
During a devastating fire, Shirou Emiya loses his parents and is adopted by a mysterious magus, Kiritsugu Emiya. Despite having limited magical abilities, Shirou dreams of becoming a hero like his adoptive father. One fateful night, he stumbles upon a secret battle between powerful magi known as Masters and their summoned mythical heroes, the Servants. In a desperate attempt to save himself, Shirou accidentally summons a powerful Servant named Saber.

Unbeknownst to him, Shirou has been thrust into the Holy Grail War, a deadly competition where seven Masters and their Servants fight for the chance to claim the omnipotent Holy Grail, a relic said to grant any wish. As the fifth Holy Grail War unfolds in Fuyuki City, Shirou must navigate the treacherous world of magic and battle, all while struggling to uphold his ideals of justice and self-sacrifice. With the odds stacked against him, can Shirou become the hero he's always dreamed of, or will he fall in the pursuit of his dreams?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
